item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
<blockquote>That forum thread was painfull to read, I thought the wow-europe forums were bad ... is it in the nature for US people to whine like 12 year old girls with skinned knees?</blockquote>
Would that it were not so, but... yes. This is why I almost never read forums.
item.content:encoded:
That forum thread was painfull to read, I thought the wow-europe forums were bad … is it in the nature for US people to whine like 12 year old girls with skinned knees?

Would that it were not so, but… yes. This is why I almost never read forums.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
My favorite comment from this thread, and far better than the usual "lrn2play" etc:
<blockquote>your tears sustain me :p</blockquote>
item.content:encoded:
My favorite comment from this thread, and far better than the usual “lrn2play” etc:

your tears sustain me :p

item.title: By: World of Warcraft Patch 2.1.0 | Wissen belastet

item.description: [...] Mein Favorit AFKGamer natürlich auch nicht. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Mein Favorit AFKGamer natürlich auch nicht. […]

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: Well since the patch I get a stutter every 2 seconds no matter what I have my video settings on.
item.content:encoded: Well since the patch I get a stutter every 2 seconds no matter what I have my video settings on.

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.description: My favorite patch day bug - apparently they made a small error in updating the flask of distilled wisdom buff, and it was increasing intellect by 2,000. (instead of mana)
item.content:encoded: My favorite patch day bug – apparently they made a small error in updating the flask of distilled wisdom buff, and it was increasing intellect by 2,000. (instead of mana)
